hooks.prompt: Analyze the session to determine if a progress report is needed. APPROVE if ANY of these are true: 1) /progress-report or SlashCommand with progress-report was already executed in this session, 2) No significant code changes were made (only read operations, questions, or minor edits to .md/.json config files), 3) Session was exploratory/research only (no Write/Edit to source code files like .ts, .tsx, .scss, .css, .js, .jsx, .py). BLOCK only if ALL of these are true: 1) Significant source code was created or modified (Write/Edit to .ts/.tsx/.scss/.css/.js/.jsx/.py files), 2) /progress-report was NOT executed, 3) Changes were part of a planned implementation task. Return {"decision": "approve"} or {"decision": "block", "reason": "Source code changes detected. Run /progress-report to document before stopping."}.
